channel.title: Minnesota AG Press Releases
channel.description: Latest press releases from the Minnesota Attorney General's Office

item.title: Attorney General Ellison sues to ‘stop Trump from bullying vulnerable children’ in Minnesota
item.description:
Publication Date: April 22, 2025

Files lawsuit as Trump Administration repeatedly threatens to cut federal funding to Minnesota schools if state does not cave to Trump’s attempts to deny civil rights of transgender people

https://www.ag.state.mn.us/Office/Communications/2025/04/22_EO_TitleIX.asp
